def_en: When there is fog, there are tiny drops of water in the air which form a thick cloud and make it difficult to see things.
A fog is an unpleasant cloud of something such as smoke inside a building or room.
You can use fog to refer to a situation which stops people from being able to notice things, understand things, or think clearly.

def_cn: (使)(窗户、镜子等)起雾;(使)变模糊
def_en: If a window, mirror, or other glass surface fogs or is fogged, it becomes covered with very small drops of water so that you cannot see things clearly through it or in it.
